oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Section of the State of Tennessee
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Maps
Maps; Agriculture
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Map shows a sectional cut of the state of Tennessee from Roane Mountain in Carter County and Smoky Mountain in Cocke County to Randolph on the Mississippi River. Contains data on the strata of the state as well as geographical identifications.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Duval, Peter S.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Notes indicate the map was part of a report to the Tennessee General Assembly by Dr. Gerald Troost (1776-1850), an American-Dutch naturalist and mineralogist who serevd as State Geologist of Tennessee from 1831-1850.
